thread.title: Chance The Rapper Previews Collab With Future Called "My Peak"
thread.title_full: Chance The Rapper Previews Collab With Future Called "My Peak"

author: Zakk Feig
title: Chance The Rapper Previews Collab With Future Called "My Peak"
text:
Home > Music > Chance The Rapper Previews Collab With Future Called "My Peak" Chance The Rapper Previews Collab With Future Called "My Peak"   07:04pm Chance The Rapper has fans tweaking off his upcoming collab with Future. 
Chance The Rapper is currently on top of the world, and that reign has only just begun. The Chicago MC took to Instagram today to preview an upcoming collaboration with Atlanta trap god Future. Their upcoming collab is speculated to be called "My Peak." 
Their last track together, "Smoke Break," was a Coloring Book standout, so the hopes are high for this one. 
Check out the IG videos below, and let us know your thoughts in the comments. What project do you think this track will be coming off of, if any? A post shared by Chance The Rapper (@chancetherapper) on Feb 20, 2017 at 3:29pm PST A post shared by Chance The Rapper (@chancetherapper) on Feb 20, 2017 at 3:54pm PST   07:04pm 0 Views
